name: Slice&Dice
description: Slice & Dice is a puzzle game where the objective is to place the die in the goal frame. Using realistic physics, the player can move the die by affecting the cubes within the environment through a variety of actions like slicing and destroying them. Itâ€™s a party game that players and viewers alike can enjoy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 700 MB available space
